function.name: CreateBuff

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The name of that stat to modify

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: The amount to modify the stat by

parameter.name: mulitply
parameter.description: If true then the stat is scaled by value otherwise it is summed

function.description: Creates a buff stat to be used with a BuffEffect

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The object that will recieve the buff

parameter.name: priority
parameter.description: The priority of the buff. Buffs are applied in order of high priority to low priority.

parameter.name: buffs
parameter.description: The list of buffs to apply. Use CreateBuff and BuildList to make a list of buffs to apply

parameter.name: effect
parameter.description: A reference to the buff effect. Use the cancel effect to remove a buff.

effect.description: Applies a buff, or debuff to a target
